SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Baby
Represents a Baby entity stored in the "baby" MongoDB collection.
BabyNannyApiApplication
Main class for the BabyNanny Spring Boot application.
BabyRepository
Repository interface for managing Baby entities in MongoDB.
Controller
Controller responsible for handling all Baby-related API requests.
CorsConfig
Configuration class for enabling and customizing CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) in the BabyNanny API.
EmailRepository
Repository interface for managing Emails entities in MongoDB.
Emails
Represents an email verification entry stored in the "emails" MongoDB collection.
EmailService
Service class for sending emails related to user registration and verification.
Event
 
Event.DayConfig
Class created to manage an event of a user
Event.Dot
Contains the inner information of an event, such as description or the Date
Features
Represents the features or characteristics of a baby.
FeaturesRecord
Represents a historical record of a Baby's features.
FeaturesRecordRepository
Repository interface for managing FeaturesRecord entities in MongoDB.
IntakeRecord
Represents a record of a Baby's intake stored in the "intakeRecord" MongoDB collection.
IntakeRecordRepository
Repository interface for managing IntakeRecord entities in MongoDB.
MedicalRecord
Represents a medical record of a Baby stored in the "medicalRecord" MongoDB collection.
MedicalRecordRepository
Repository interface for managing MedicalRecord entities in MongoDB.
Recipe
Represents a prescription or medication instruction for a Baby.
SleepRecord
Represents a record of a Baby's sleep stored in the "sleepRecord" MongoDB collection.
SleepRecordRepository
Repository interface for managing SleepRecord entities in MongoDB.
Token
Represents an authentication token for a user, stored in the "tokens" MongoDB collection.
TokenRepository
Repository interface for managing Token entities in MongoDB.
User
Represents a User in the BabyNanny application, stored in the "user" MongoDB collection.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing User entities in MongoDB.
